data.text: Hello World

VRtualis has officialy started, and is ready to serve the NeosVR community as a large freelanceing and volenteer community! Talented Logix Wizards, Enviromental Artists, and Modeling Artists are ready to help new uers and veteran players alike, from learning how the game works to building the next big project, together VRtualis is here to help build the Metaverse of Tomorrow!
Our first metahome is public!

For any and all NeosVR players looking for a new Cloud Home to live your days in the metaverse in, look no further than our first official metahome, aiming to simulate what it would be like to live in the Urban streets of Paris.

title: Modern Home
headline: A VRtualis metahome made with baked lighting!

data.text: Baked lighting is amazing
For most worlds in NeosVR, Baked lighting is a dream to have, but for us at VRtualis, we have our methods of creating, performant, and beutiful Reflections, and Lightmap data that is NeosVR friendly.

title: Simple Living
headline: A VRtualis metahome made with baked lighting! Again!

data.text: Smaller homes can be cozy.
Yet another, smaller, metahome for NeosVR users to have as their cloud home to spawn in and have a chill place to hang out when the metaverse gets alittle to busy.

title: BlueLITE Gen3
headline: First VRtulis product for all NeosVR users alike

data.text: Finally a Gen3

One thing that you, as the user, may or may not notice, there are no longer existing Gen1 or Gen2 BlueLITE blueprints archived, like other products that have been made. This choise was made to keep the folder clean and not have "too many choises" provided by us.
Gen3 does how ever, use a similar setup to Gen1, it uses 3D quads for the physical aspect of grabbing your nodes and the scale handle for changing the size of your workspace.
The UIX portion of BlueLITE Gen3 is used for other interactions and decals like, titles, changing between workspace and compact, and toggling grabbable.

title: BlueLITE Gen4
headline: A benefitial update to your workflow!

data.text: BlueLTE Gen4

Some issues with Gen3 have been fixed! starting with your nodes, and accidental placement of itesm on the board are now removable. Also, finding the "DevPacked" option is now easier, it is now a bright red slot on the main hierarchy of the blueprint.
For those that work in small and large avatars, there is a autoscale feature to the blueprint wich will locally scale a placed node to 1,1,1 to keep it all uniform to the blueprint.

Also, the UI has been changed to follow the length of the board, and provides a slimmer look. I've also re-added the input and output relay options, these are really useful for those that like to make prefab blueprints with a common function that they might want to share or use later.

title: YouTube Player v2
headline: Let's bring something familiar into neos.

data.text: YouTube Player v2

So for those that enjoyed the previous version of the YouTube player, I'm hopping you are going to like this one alot more! The UI can changed ever so slightly just to follow the YouTube style & layout more closely, just to make it that much more familiar.
This is a work in progress item!

This item is currently still work in progress, there are still some planned and unfinished features for this item, but you can still use it for playlists and searching videos! just locate it in "[PUBLIC] VRtualis > WIP Itmes > YouTube Player > v2" and use the last one.
